t: NCSoft to develop new games through standalone subsidiaries, laying off staff amid corporate split-off | Game World Observer
s: December 2, 2024 - NCSoft, which recently launched its new MMORPG Throne and Liberty, has announced a corporate restructuring. The South Korean game company will also lay off an undisclosed number of employees.
